mapper.select: select BOARD_SEQ , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONT , BOARD_VIS , BOARD_DATE , CATEGORY_SEQ , MEMBER_SEQ from BOARD where board_flag = 'T' and CATEGORY_SEQ=#{CATEGORY_SEQ} order by BOARD_SEQ desc

select b.BOARD_SEQ , b.BOARD_TITLE , b.BOARD_CONT , b.BOARD_VIS , b.BOARD_DATE , b.CATEGORY_SEQ , b.MEMBER_SEQ , c.CATEGORY_NAME
from BOARD b, CATEGORY c
where b.CATEGORY_SEQ = c.CATEGORY_SEQ b.board_flag = 'T' and b.BOARD_TITLE = '테스트'

select b.BOARD_SEQ , b.BOARD_TITLE , b.BOARD_CONT , b.BOARD_VIS , b.BOARD_DATE , b.CATEGORY_SEQ , b.MEMBER_SEQ from BOARD b where b.BOARD_SEQ = (select max(BOARD_SEQ) from BOARD where BOARD_FLAG = 'T' and CATEGORY_SEQ = #{CATEGORY_SEQ})
